scripts.quality:fix: prettier --write . && eslint . --fix && ruff check src/backend --fix && ruff format src/backend && svelte-check
scripts.ttia:clone: test -d external/TranslationToolsIA || mkdir -p external && git clone https://github.com/Virusf/TranslationToolsIA.git external/TranslationToolsIA
scripts.ttia:update: test -d external/TranslationToolsIA && git -C external/TranslationToolsIA pull || echo 'TranslationToolsIA non clon√©. Lancez: pnpm run ttia:clone'
